comments:
20031121 12 noon

If you exit Eclipse while you are loading a module you get the following 
exception:

STEPS
1) Load platform-ui
2) Exit immediately. Job should be cancelled on workbench shutdown

Command-line arguments: -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -install 
file:D:/R30/1121b/eclipse/
!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.ssh 1 0 Nov 21, 2003 13:06:55.741
!MESSAGE Host key for dev.eclipse.org was not found in the list of known hosts 
stored in D:\R30
\1121b\eclipse\workspace\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.team.cvs.ssh\known_host
s. The key is being automatically added to the known_hosts file for you. This 
key, which is like a personal signature, is used by Eclipse to guarantee that 
the host it is communicating with is the correct one. If the Eclipse client 
detects a change in this key you will be notified.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Nov 21, 2003 13:09:11.117
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Checking out 'platform-ui' from 
CVS".
!STACK 0

We need to add cancellation checks to the checkout operations

Mike, can you do this then? I didn't notice that this was related to the 
checkout operations.
Cancellation was added to the appropritae places in the checkout operation.
